channel.title: Support on freiheit.com
channel.description: Recent content in Support on freiheit.com

item.description: The Speyer Cathedral The almost one thousand year old Speyer Cathedral stands as a testament to the ambitions of many great German emperors and kings. Amongst them Conrad II, Henry IV and Henry V. This long-standing beauty, consecrated in 1061 and known as the largest surviving Romanesque church in the world, was captured by Horst Hamann in 2024. The German photographer shows us a new perspective of the monument through his characteristic vertical photography style on over 190 pages.
